notes.text:
This update for graphviz fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10196: Fixed a null dereference in rebuild_vlis (bsc#1093447).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in the rebuild_vlists function in lib/dotgen/conc.c in the dotgen library in Graphviz 2.40.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file.
notes.title: CVE description
